meanings.definition: To utter intentions of injury or punishment against
meanings.sent1: He threatens to take away my toys if I don't share.
meanings.sent2: The storm threatens to damage the crops in the field.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully threatens to pounce on the moving toy.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds threaten to unleash a fierce storm upon the town.
meanings.sent5: The bully's menacing glare threatens trouble for the smaller kids.

meanings.definition: To be a source of danger to; endanger
meanings.sent1: The slippery road threatens drivers with accidents.
meanings.sent2: The rising river threatens to flood the nearby houses.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel threatens to steal all the birdseed.
meanings.sent4: The looming deadline threatens to derail the project's progress.
meanings.sent5: The loud thunder threatens to scare the young children.
